funding-group.funding-statement: ALGC was supported by Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES) ( www.capes.gov.br), financial supported was provided by Fundação Oswaldo Cruz/ILMD ( www.amazonia.fiocruz.br) – POM 2014-15. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
